name: d3-zoom
description: Pan and zoom SVG, HTML or Canvas using mouse or touch input.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-dispatch:d3,d3-drag:d3,d3-interpolate:d3,d3-selection:d3,d3-transition:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-zoom.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-zoom.js -c -m -o build/d3-zoom.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/d3-zoom.js ../d3.github.com/d3-zoom.v1.js && cp build/d3-zoom.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-zoom.v1.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-zoom.v1.js d3-zoom.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-zoom ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-zoom.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-zoom.js build/d3-zoom.min.js
